title: Calories in In-N-Out Shake
meta_description: Discover in n out shake calories, plus full nutrition breakdown including carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 16 oz milkshake (vanilla, chocolate, or strawberry flavor); includes ice cream, milk, and syrup; no toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, portion size, and customizations; values based on In-N-Out's standard recipe. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One In-N-Out shake contains about 590 kcal, with high sugar from the ice cream base.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out shake?
faqs.a: Approximately 590 kcal for one standard 16 oz shake.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in In-N-Out shake calories?
faqs.a: About 66 g of sugars, mostly from ice cream and flavoring.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out shakes high in fat?
faqs.a: 8 g total fat per shake, with 5 g saturated; moderate for a dessert.

faqs.q: Do flavors affect In-N-Out shake calories?
faqs.a: Minimal differenceâ€”chocolate or strawberry adds ~10-20 kcal vs. vanilla.

faqs.q: How much protein in an In-N-Out shake?
faqs.a: Around 13 g, from the milk and ice cream base.
